hero.title: Your Voice, Heard. Your City, Improved.
hero.subtitle: Streamlining public service complaints with the power of AI. Submit, track, and resolve civic issues seamlessly.

step1.title: 1. Submit Complaint
step1.description: Use our simple, intuitive form to detail your issue. Upload photos or documents to provide more context.

step2.title: 2. AI-Powered Routing
step2.description: Our advanced AI analyzes your complaint and instantly routes it to the correct government department, eliminating delays.

step3.title: 3. Track Progress
step3.description: Monitor your complaint status through a personal dashboard. Receive live updates and estimated resolution times.

step4.title: 4. Resolution & Feedback
step4.description: Once your issue is resolved, you'll be notified. Provide feedback to help us improve public services for everyone.

feature1.title: Intelligent Routing
feature1.description: No more guessing games. Our AI ensures your complaint reaches the right desk, right away.

feature2.title: Real-time Status
feature2.description: Transparent and accountable. Track your complaint from submission to resolution.

feature3.title: AI-Suggested Actions
feature3.description: We empower authorities with AI-driven recommendations for faster, more effective resolutions.

feature4.title: Citizen-Centric Design
feature4.description: An easy-to-use platform designed for every citizen, accessible on any device.

departments.title: Connecting You to the Right Authority
departments.subtitle: Our AI intelligently routes your complaints to various public service departments, ensuring a swift and appropriate response.

cta.title: Ready to Make a Difference?
cta.subtitle: Submit your complaint today and be a part of positive change in your community.

complaint.title: Submit Your Complaint
complaint.description: Choose your preferred method to file a complaint. We are here to help.
complaint.locationPlaceholder: e.g., Near City Park, Main Street
complaint.descriptionPlaceholder: Please describe the issue in detail.
complaint.attachmentHelp: Click to upload or drag and drop
complaint.voiceCallDescription: Call our automated system to record your complaint using your voice. Our speech-to-text AI will transcribe and process it for you.
complaint.whatsappDescription: Start a conversation with our AI-powered chatbot on WhatsApp. You can send text and images to file your complaint quickly and easily.
